English: Everyone has their own choices, you don't have to think about their choices.
Indonesian: Setiap orang memiliki pilihannya masing-masing, Anda tidak perlu memikirkan pilihan mereka.

English: Believe all the choices that you will and have chosen, always have meaning.
Indonesian: Percayalah semua pilihan yang akan dan telah Anda pilih, selalu memiliki makna.

English: Apologize
Run Away
Continue
Retry
Main Menu
It’s important to apologize after making a mistake!
Indonesian: Meminta maaf setelah membuat kesalahan sangatlah penting!

English: You should've apologized to him first!
Indonesian: Sangatlah baik untuk meminta maaf kepada Bapak tersebut!

English: Say Hello
Stare at him
Don’t forget to always be friendly towards your friends!
Indonesian: Jangan lupa untuk selalu ramah dengan teman sendiri!

English: Why are you staring at him? Say hello, no?
Indonesian: Bukannya kalian tidak bermusuhan? Ramah sedikit, dong.

English: Take the bottle into the trash
Indonesian: Buang botol air ke tempat sampah

English: Kick the bottle
Everyone should keep the environment clean!
Indonesian: Kebersihan lingkungan sangatlah penting untuk semua orang!

English: If you don’t want to pick it up, just let it be!
Indonesian: Jika kamu tidak ingin menjaga lingkungan, setidaknya biarkan saja!

English: Say “Excuse me” then pass
Yell then pass
Always remember to be polite to elders!
Indonesian: Selalu ingat untuk bersikap sopan kepada orang yang lebih tua!

English: Hei, it’s not appropriate you know?!
Bring it to police station
Take the money
If you ever found a lost items, bring it to the police station!
Indonesian: Selalu antarkan barang hilang ke pihak yang berwenang ya!

English: Why did you take the money?? It's not yours!
Indonesian: Kenapa kamu malah mengambil uangnya?? Itu bukan hakmu!

English: Wash hands and feet
Enter the house
Obeying parents is an act of good children!
Indonesian: Menjaga kebersihan dan menuruti orang tua merupakan tindakan anak baik!

English: It's better to listen to your mother!
Indonesian: Hei dengarkan ibumu, cucilah tangan dan kakimu terlebih dahulu!.

English: Go eat
Play in the bedroom
It's important to keep your stomach full!
Indonesian: Menjaga perut tetap terisi setelah banyak bermain penting sekali agar tidak mudah sakit!

English: If you don’t want to get sick, you should eat first!.
Indonesian: Lebih baik kamu makan dahulu, daripada kamu sakit nantinya!.

English: Sleep
Watch tv
Following parents advice is the way to be a good child!
Indonesian: Mengikuti nasihat orang tua merupakan jalan menjadi anak berbakti!

English: Listen to your mother! Stop watching cartoons all day!
Indonesian: Dengarkanlah nasihat ibumu!, kenapa kamu malah menonton seharian?

English: Study
Make cheat sheet
Always learning will not hinder yourself!
Indonesian: Belajar bersama tidak akan menghambat prestasimu!

English: Hei, cheating is an unacceptable behavior!
Indonesian: Hei, menyontek adalah perilaku tak terpuji!

English: Prepare yourself
Skipping school
Be responsible for everything you take!
Indonesian: Bertanggung jawab memang harus ditanam sejak dini.

English: Running away from responsibilities will not solve your problem..
Indonesian: Lari dari tanggung jawab tidak akan membuat masalahmu selesai.

English: Save your money
Ask parents for money
Your future self will be grateful that you start saving from now!
Indonesian: Dirimu di masa depan akan bersyukur karena kamu menabung saat ini!

English: Your needs are not the only thing that matters!
Indonesian: Kebutuhanmu bukan satu satunya yang paling penting!

English: Use your own money
Steal things
If you own money can cover it for now, why not?
Who taught you to steal?? It’s not good!
Indonesian: Mencuri tidak pernah diajarkan di sekolah !

English: Help him
Go to school canteen
Helping your homeroom teacher is not a bad thing!
Indonesian: Melakukan perintah gurumu juga merupakan ibadah lho.

English: Teachers are like parents at school, if you are able to help them, help them!
Indonesian: Guru juga merupakan orang tua di sekolah, jika kamu bisa membantu, bantu saja!

English: Help your mother
Go with your friends
Indonesian: Pergi bersama teman tanpa membantu ibu

English: Helping your mother is a good act you can do!
Indonesian: Membantu orang tua adalah tindakan terpuji!

English: Prioritize your mother over your friends! Because your mother has always been with you!
Indonesian: Utamakan ibumu daripada teman, karena ibumu selalu bersamamu dari dulu!

English: Stop smoking
Keep smoking
Keep patience, don’t be mad because they are your parents!
Indonesian: Bersabar dan patuh terhadap orang tua adalah tindakan yang terpuji!

English: Your parents know what's best for you, if you don't follow them, who will you follow?!
Indonesian: Orang tuamu tau yang terbaik untukmu, jika kamu tidak mengikutinya, siapa yang akan kamu ikuti?!

English: Warn him
Don’t know, don’t care
Theft is never right, whatever the reason!
Indonesian: Tidak pernah baik untuk melakukan pencurian apapun alasannya!

English: Why don’t you stop him? If you can stop him, why not?
Indonesian: Kenapa kau tidak menegurnya? Selagi bisa menegur kenapa tidak?
